QuestData.Title: Crime and Punishment
QuestData.Description: The Stinging Trail nurtures young Kypari trees. The empress drains the saplings too early, outsider. They must grow before the amber can be taken.$b$bThe Klaxxi'va demand punishment for this crime! It will please them if you rain death on the Ik'thik harvesters.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Amber Harvesters on the Stinging Trail.
